meanings.sent1: I love to eat pupus at the luau.
meanings.sent2: The pupus at the party were delicious.
meanings.sent3: The pupus disappeared quickly at the family gathering.
meanings.sent4: The pupus were like little bites of paradise.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pupus made the table look festive.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'pupa', referring to the life stage of some insects.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, we found many pupus transforming into butterflies.
meanings.sent2: The pupus in the jar will soon become beautiful butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The curious pupus were having a race to see who would transform first.
meanings.sent4: The pupus in the garden were like tiny mysteries waiting to unfold.
meanings.sent5: The delicate pupus were nature's little miracles in progress.
